title: Mongoose BMX-Bicycle-Frames Title
features: Designed for beginner-level riders, the Mongoose Title Mini BMX race bike is a trophy-worthy bike at an amazingly affordable price. Suggested rider height is 4'2" - 4'10".
Lightweight Tectonic T1 aluminum frame, integrated headset and internal cable routing for clean lines and added protection. 17.48” top tube length and frame weight of 2.69 lbs.
The Title’s drivetrain features 140mm 3-piece tubular chromo cranks with a 39T chain ring and euro cartridge bottom bracket.
The wheelset features Arisen XLR8 20” tires mounted on exposure aluminum double wall rims with aluminum ball bearing front hub and 16T cog freewheel rear hub.

Aluminum linear pull brake and brake levers offer quality speed control, while the Hi-Ten chromo handlebar and fork are joined by a 30mm stem and sealed bearing headset to combine for excellent steering performance.
description: For 45 years, Mongoose has been in the dirt, down the trails, and on the ramps. Founded in 1974 in a Southern California garage, Mongoose was born from BMX Racing with products that push the limits of what a rider can do on the track. Our latest line of BMX race bikes, the title series, have been designed using that same race pedigree. Designed for beginner-level riders, the Mongoose Title Micro gives you a trophy-worthy bike at an amazingly affordable price! The title features a lightweight Tectonic T1 aluminum frame (16. 50” top tube), integrated headset, and internal cable routing for clean lines and added protection. The title hi-ten steel 2-inch rise handlebar and 30mm stem are designed for precision riding, while the strong Exposure double-wall alloy rims and Arisen XLR8 BMX race tires add crucial durability without weighing you down. The 39x16t gearing with two-piece tubular chromo 130-millimeter cranks, and Euro cartridge bottom bracket offer a high-quality drivetrain capable of winning speeds. Aluminum linear pull bikes with aluminum brake levers provide speed control, while the hi-ten BMX fork with 1-1/8" Thread less steered and taper leg helps maximize performance. This bike ships ready to be assembled and comes with a 5-year limited on the frame and a 1-year limited on parts.
